DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , post-market clinical study intend evaluate delivery deployment longer Zilver PTX stent ( ≥ 100 mm ) compare short Zilver PTX stent ( ≤80 mm ) treatment lesion above-the-knee femoropopliteal artery .
DOC.brief_title: Zilver PTX Drug-Eluting Peripheral Stent Study
DOC.criteria: One de novo restenosed artherosclerotic lesion > 50 % diameter stenosis Reference vessel diameter 4 9 mm Rutherford category ≥ 2 Resting ankle brachial index < 0.9 Prior stent study vessel Significant stenosis ( > 50 % ) occlusion inflow tract successfully treat study procedure Lacks least one patent runoff vessel Lesions require atherectomy , cut balloon , cryoplasty balloon , advanced device facilitate stent delivery
